metadata.name: AIR RAID ALERT
metadata.description:
I've always had problems writing elaborate text, loud creative titles, using beautiful turns of phrase or defining manifestos, which are a necessity for a modern visual artist. Therefore, I will do as I have always done: in this series I will try to express my emotions with the help of visual art. Anger / Hatred / Pain / Pride for one's country / and of course Hope. That's what I have been experiencing under constant shelling for almost 2 months now, and what my homeland lives through today. And surely I'll try not to forget about humor in these dark days, at least for now.)

So everyone is welcome. I hope you'll have a little room in your heart for my art.



"AIR RAID ALERT"

My feelings and emotions in 30 seconds at 30fps / 192kbps. 
MP4 1280x1600.
